project.description: Custom job intended to be triggered at any instant of time. Git Clone and Build has to be done before triggering this job since Build is on RedHat mac. Uses VECTORCAST in /mnt/nfs/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/custom/VCAST_LINUX

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
cd $WORKSPACE
#export VECTORCAST_DIR=/mnt/nfs/shared/package_build/vc_remove_wrappers export VECTORCAST_DIR=/mnt/nfs/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/JOB_6PM/VCAST_LINUX export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/linuxregressionmac/flexlm/vector-UBUNTU.lic export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH echo $VECTORCAST_DIR $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
cp -r /mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins_Harvester/Git/tests $WORKSPACE #cp -r /home/vectorindia/workspace/Harvester/tests $WORKSPACE
#CMake and run VcRunTests mkdir tbuild32 cd tbuild32 cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ #echo vcQuickParseTest > vc_test_add_dir #echo vcInstTest >> vc_test_add_dir #echo PortabilityTest >> vc_test_add_dir $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py --metrics
